scenes.description: Shinchan is watching TV in his pajamas, dancing to a jingle.

dialogues.line: La-la-laaa~ Mom said no aliens allowed today! But I say—bring 'em on!
Shinchan! Stop being weird and go outside!

scenes.description: A green flash crashes nearby. SHINCHAN runs toward it, licking an ice cream.

dialogues.line: Oooooh! Free fireworks? Or… maybe alien poop?
Whoa! That was too close. Some alien tech fell into this area—wait, where am I?
You’re in Kasukabe! And I’m your tour guide, Shinchan, professional mischief-maker!
Nice to meet you, Shinchan. I’m Ben. I’m kinda saving the world right now.
Cool! I’m kinda annoying my mom right now. Wanna team up?
Actually, yeah. But stay close—this could get dangerous.

scenes.description: A GIANT ROBOT ALIEN appears, smashing trees and yelling in alien language.

dialogues.line: Guess we’ve got company. Time to go hero!
Can I drive? Wait, do aliens eat butts?

scenes.description: Ben finishes the fight by transforming into Four Arms, smashing the robot into scrap.

dialogues.line: I caught a big one! It's uglier than Action Kamen’s villain!
We’re like the ultimate hero duo! Ben & Butt-Man!
Let’s stick with Ben 10 and Shinchan.

scenes.description: They sit on a bench eating ice cream.

dialogues.line: Thanks, Shinchan. You’re weird—but you’re awesome.
And you’re cool—for an alien babysitter!

parsed_data.formatted_text:
SCRIPT TIMELINE
Total Duration: 0:05:00
Total Scenes: 5


================================================================================

SCENE 1
INT. Kasukabe - Shinchan's House - Morning
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 3 minutes

Description:
Shinchan is watching TV in his pajamas, dancing to a jingle.

Main Characters: SHINCHAN, MITSY

Technical Cues:
  - TV background noise

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - TV remote
    - pajamas
  LIGHTING:
    - Indoor morning lighting
  SOUND:
    - Jingle music on TV
  CAMERA:
    - Wide shot of living room


Dialogue:
SHINCHAN (cheeky)
    "La-la-laaa~ Mom said no aliens allowed today! But I say—bring 'em on!"

MITSY (yelling from kitchen)
    "Shinchan! Stop being weird and go outside!"


Transitions: CUT TO

================================================================================

SCENE 2
EXT. Park - Same Time
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 2 minutes

Description:
A green flash crashes nearby. SHINCHAN runs toward it, licking an ice cream.

Main Characters: SHINCHAN, BEN

Technical Cues:
  - Green flash VFX
  - Smoke

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - Ice cream cone
    - Omnitrix
  LIGHTING:
    - Daylight
  SOUND:
    - Crash sound effect
  CAMERA:
    - Tracking shot following Shinchan


Dialogue:
SHINCHAN
    "Oooooh! Free fireworks? Or… maybe alien poop?"

BEN
    "Whoa! That was too close. Some alien tech fell into this area—wait, where am I?"

SHINCHAN
    "You’re in Kasukabe! And I’m your tour guide, Shinchan, professional mischief-maker!"

BEN (laughs)
    "Nice to meet you, Shinchan. I’m Ben. I’m kinda saving the world right now."

SHINCHAN
    "Cool! I’m kinda annoying my mom right now. Wanna team up?"

BEN (chuckles)
    "Actually, yeah. But stay close—this could get dangerous."


Transitions: SFX: RUMBLING

================================================================================

SCENE 3
EXT. Park - Continuous
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 5 minutes

Description:
A GIANT ROBOT ALIEN appears, smashing trees and yelling in alien language.

Main Characters: SHINCHAN, BEN

Technical Cues:
  - Robot VFX
  - Trees falling

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - Toy fishing rod
  LIGHTING:
    - Daylight with dramatic shadows
  SOUND:
    - Robot growls
    - Tree crashing
  CAMERA:
    - Dynamic angles for action


Dialogue:
ROBOT ALIEN (Growling)
    "Give me the Omnitrix!"

BEN
    "Guess we’ve got company. Time to go hero!"

BEN (XLR8)
    "Let’s move, Shinchan!"

SHINCHAN
    "Can I drive? Wait, do aliens eat butts?"

BEN (XLR8)
    "...What?"


Transitions: ACTION SEQUENCE

================================================================================

SCENE 4
EXT. Park - Post-Action
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 3 minutes

Description:
Ben finishes the fight by transforming into Four Arms, smashing the robot into scrap.

Main Characters: SHINCHAN, BEN

Technical Cues:
  - Transformation VFX

Department Notes:
  LIGHTING:
    - Post-action shading
  SOUND:
    - Metal clangs
    - Alien language
  CAMERA:
    - Close-ups of action


Dialogue:
SHINCHAN
    "I caught a big one! It's uglier than Action Kamen’s villain!"

BEN (Four Arms)
    "Teamwork for the win!"

SHINCHAN
    "We’re like the ultimate hero duo! Ben & Butt-Man!"

BEN
    "Let’s stick with Ben 10 and Shinchan."


Transitions: CUT TO

================================================================================

SCENE 5
EXT. Park - Sunset
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Estimated Duration: 2 minutes

Description:
They sit on a bench eating ice cream.

Main Characters: SHINCHAN, BEN

Technical Cues:
  - End credits

Department Notes:
  PROPS:
    - Ice cream cones
  LIGHTING:
    - Sunset lighting
  SOUND:
    - Laughing
    - Ending theme
  CAMERA:
    - Wide sunset shot


Dialogue:
BEN
    "Thanks, Shinchan. You’re weird—but you’re awesome."

SHINCHAN
    "And you’re cool—for an alien babysitter!"


Transitions: ROLL CREDITS
